nodes.text: Following the death of Emperor Palpatine at the Battle of Endor in 4 ABY, a fleet led by the Imperial Moff Royen found itself cut off from support near the Red Hand Cluster. Isolated coincidentally, the fleet became a de facto Imperial splinter faction. An agent in the New Republic's Intelligence branch named Caern Adan cited the isolation of Royan's fleet during a meeting with General Hera Syndulla and the New Republic's Alphabet Squadron.
Royen's fleet was mentioned in the 2019 novel Alphabet Squadron, written by Alexander Freed.
